preferences.name: refreshInterval
preferences.title: Refresh Interval
preferences.description: Specify how often you want to reload the home page.

preferences.name: historyItemsNumber
preferences.title: Number of history items on the home page
preferences.description: Choose how many history items you want to see.

preferences.name: retmax
preferences.title: RetMax
preferences.description: Set the maximum number of results to be returned in a query. The default value is 20, but it can be increased up to 100,000. Be aware that increasing RetMax may result in longer query times and higher resource usage from PubMed (https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/). It is recommended to set RetMax to a value that meets your needs without compromising the performance of the API.

preferences.name: apikey
preferences.title: NIH API Key
preferences.description:
Without an API key, you can only make 3 requests per second. Unfortunately, when listing multiple articles, an additional request is sent for each item, so you may receive `Error 429` (too many requests). It is therefore recommended to set an API key to increase the limit to 10 requests/second. Further information at https://support.nlm.nih.gov/knowledgebase/article/KA-05317/en-us

You can enter "0" here if you do not have an API key.
